author: Thomas Duffy, Bleacher Report
title: Marlins make rookies dress up as 'Baywatch' girls
text: Marlins make rookies dress up as 'Baywatch' girls Comment By Thomas Duffy, Bleacher Report Pekin Daily Times By Thomas Duffy, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 5:00 PM By Thomas Duffy, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 5:00 PM Itâ€™s not easy being a rookie. First-year players are perennially forced to wear and do some ridiculous things, so it should come as no surprise that a bunch of Miami Marlins rookies were dressed up as Baywatch girls after losing to the Tampa Bay Rays Thursday night. (Photo via Twitter .) Questionable? Yes. By Thomas Duffy, Bleacher Report Pekin Daily Times By Thomas Duffy, Bleacher Report Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 5:00 PM
